column5: Of asking buddy if I could use his sail, and invent a new sport, ,,,,   Parratoon sailing, but that thought left pretty fast. LOL   WINDY
you could speed troll  LOL YA  I went for a drive up the mountian to seek residents. Only a few wee ones played. Quick releases.
Of asking buddy if I could use his sail, and invent a new sport, ,,,,   Parratoon sailing, but that thought left pretty fast. LOL   WINDY     Good Call !
With the winds this weekend all you needed to do was hold up an empty grocery bag in both hands as a sail and you would have been across the bay in minutes!
Omg please do this when its a "lil calmer" ???
On that west wind you could cover Lake O to the Atlantic in about 1/2 an hour Brian. lol.
